archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Establish Loyalty Program Profile
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Create a profile for a loyalty program participant.

properties.value: Establish Loyalty Program Profile creates a profile for a loyalty program participant by interacting with the Party Relationship & Development process. For example, suppose an enterprise has an agreement with a partner that allows a participant to earn currency in the partner's loyalty program; the participant may choose as a default to earn currency in the partner's program.
